item.title: wrong info
item.content:encoded:

Dramatic Battler
Level 1: +1 Max Glowslinging Duel per day (30 Awesome)
Level 2: +2 Max Glowslinging Duels per day (60 Awesome)
Level 3: +3 Max Glowslinging Duels per day, +20% Talent (100 Awesome)
